metadata.feature_description: Displays top community contributors with their engagement metrics and avatars

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens showing Top Users section with user avatars
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function. Panel content area is blank.

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics module from initializing: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to user profiles on click

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics to click on user
steps.expected: User row should be clickable and navigate to user profile
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics to view metrics
steps.expected: User contribution metrics (value column) should be displayed with tooltips
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics to compare metrics across different time periods
steps.expected: Should be able to view and compare user metrics for different date ranges
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Unable to test due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

observations: Critical Bug: Community Analytics module fails to initialize with JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at dashboardClass.init function
The utility.serializeCustomDate function is missing or not properly defined in the utility module
This bug blocks ALL testing of Community Analytics features including Top Community Users Display

Code review of communityUsers.js shows the component is properly implemented with: user avatars (avatarUrl), click navigation (navigate function), empty state handling (No Data Available message), and user metrics display
The issue appears to be in the parent dashboard initialization, not in the communityUsers component itself
